content: work friendly ear cozy make 2 note i needed an ear cozy that could be worn discreetly at work and that did not affect my hearing thus the hole materials needed flesh colored or hair colored worsted weight yarn i used caron simply soft heather in truffle heather 4 mm crochet hook optional 3 5 mm steel crochet hook for when it becomes difficult to sl st over previous sl sts directions with chosen yarn and 4 mm crochet hook chain 9 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 8 sts 2 turn chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch single_crochet in next st chain 6 skip the next 4 stitches single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in last stitch 3 turn chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch single_crochet in next st 8 half_double_crochet in chain 6 space single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in last stitch *you will begin to work in rounds here* 4 turn chain 1 single_crochet in next 12 stitches and continue around the side of the piece i e do not turn 2 single_crochet in side of row 2 and 3 slip_stitch in the back loop of the 8 stitches from row 1 2 single_crochet in the side of row 2 and 3 join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet of this round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in next 11 stitches half_double_crochet in next 3 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next stitch do not join at end of round but continue to work in rounds 6 single_crochet in next 14 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts single_crochet in next 2 stitches do not join 7 single_crochet in first 4 stitches 2sctog 2sctog single_crochet in next 6 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts single_crochet in next 2 stitches do not join 8 single_crochet in next 12 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts single_crochet in next 2 stitches join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet of this round and tie off weave in ends note i found that you have to press the edge of the cozy around the back of your ear to fit it to your ear and make it grasp your ear properly size note apparently i have dainty ears this worked out to be 2 75 inches long and 1 75 inches wide to change the sizing i recommend using a larger hook and/or thicker yarn another option is to add stitches to the beginning chain and keep track of where to change the stitch counts thereafter errata i realized that i forgot to add a sentence when i was typing this up to make the ear cozy slightly more shaped for the right ear you need to change row 5 just slightly for right ear 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first stitch single_crochet in next 13 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts half_double_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet in next stitch do not join at end of round
